But when it hit, it was a sort of "giddy" high, not like a super pixie-stick rush. I also can't say I experienced much of a telltale caffeine crash either, the extra energy just quietly bled away.

All-in-all, should I decide to pick up a coffee drink, I wouldn't hesitate to get another one from illy issimo.

My twin boys both love this food.  It has the best texture of any of the HAPPYBABY meats we've tried.  The pieces of chicken and pasta aren't too big either.  This is great for babies resistant to texture--It has some but not too much!

I ordered this BECAUSE it said it was Splenda sweetened. Upon receiving the tea, there isn't one grain of Splenda in this box - it's ASPARTAME sweetened!

The flavor is ok...diluted - I use a 22oz Thermos of cold water and 1 packet...any less water and the Aspartame gives a 'bite' to it that I don't care for.

I will stick with ARIZONA brand tea packets as I have been using them for years and they are sweetened with Splenda...order being placed for Arizona now.

ADD: This packet isn't filled very much, it's about 1/4 filled with power, a big waste of the material used to hold it. Vs. Arizona Tea: The Arizona is filled 3/4 full of powder and flavors a 22 oz Thermos nicely - the Lipton makes a very weak flavor. For your money - buy Arizona powdered teas.

I was expecting a variety of jelly bellies and bought 2 bags thinking that would give even greater variety. There were only a few flavors and both bags were the same. They were not flavors I like or would ever buy.

If you like every flavor of Jelly belly the same, this may work for you. Otherwise, you get what you pay for!

It is a great potato chip product eventhough I prefer Pringles. I don't consider them the best chips because the cheesy flavor does get somewhat repetetive, but overall it istill is a very good product.

I never really believed there was that much difference in types of salt until I tried this brand. A lot of cooking TV shows mentioned using kosher salt but I never though much of it. But this salt is really different than any others I've had. I don't know if it is the process of making kosher salt, or the raw source ingredients, or the shape of the flakes, but every other salt I've had pales in comparison. I even thought it might be just my imagination, but I've had people come over and after they salted something they specifically mentioned how good this salt tasted. It's not all kosher salts, though, because I tried Morton's kosher salt after this ran out and it had a horrible chemical aftertaste, and the flakes weren't as light and thin as these.

If you don't know, kosher salt is make by evaporating water, so it's supposed to be a more natural and unprocessed kind of salt. Maybe Morton uses some other additives or something. The flakes of this salt are very light and there is no chemical aftertaste, just a very flavorful clean salt. Chefs also like this salt because the wide flakes make more contact area with meats and other foods which enhances the effect and draws out moisture faster (which is helpful in a good sear). Since the flakes are so light, this salt is even useful when it's not dissolved into the food all the way. The denser table salt is overwhelmingly salty if a patch of it hits your tongue. But the light fluffy flakes of this salt just taste like a burst of flavor. I think that's why it's the only salt where guests actually comment on the salt specifically, they probably had a pleasant surprise getting one whole flake melting on their tongue.

My local Whole Foods stopped selling this brand so I was elated to find this salt on Amazon and hope they continue to sell it!

Summary: Only a pack of three! And tastes terrible!
Text: This was on super discount when I got it so it was only a waste of like $3 but nowhere does it say that it's actually some super disgusting, highly potent mutant cousin of Earl Grey tea. I bought it thinking it was straight black Ceylon tea. No such luck and now I have nothing to make fermented kombucha with. Utter disappointment and I love Earl Grey!

The trouble with many mint teas is that the minty flavoring overpowers the underlying tea leaves. Too often, mint is used to make inferior tea taste palatable. Stash's Mint Green Tea is different. It has a rich and well-rounded flavor, which I prefer to that of their flowery plain green tea. And the price is quite reasonable for such a refreshing beverage, especially if you use Amazon's Subscribe & Save.

As the weather warms up, this versatile tea is well-suited to both hot and iced brewing. I would recommend it over any other bagged tea.

reduced the amount to 1 tablespoon daily, I had
problems sleeping because Salba increased my energy and mental alertness.
I drink a lot of different coffees and this brand was superior to most.  Great flavor with low acid and rich overall taste.

I used to go to a local coffee shop to get these drinks for about $4. Now I can make them at home for a fraction of the cost. They are delicious! I like the single serving packets, but my husband and I end up using three packets to make two good size drinks.
Cant beat it for the price.  Will buy again.  Looked around for a while it couldnt find any good deals

My older daughter who can eat wheat but doesn't really like any kind of chocolate cake ate it and thought it was one of the best cakes she's ever had. Summary: Yummy and good for the earth
Text:
I love Kopali's stuff. Great little snacks that are always fresh when I buy em, and good for the earth. Save the planet! Thanks Kopali!

Kopali Organics Organic Chocolate Covered Dried Banana, 2 Ounce Pouch (Pack of 6)Kopali Organics Organic Chocolate Covered Mulberries, 2 Ounce Pouch (Pack of 6)

We saw that some of the coffee reviews said that the coffee was weak when "teabagged." We put a few pods of Marley Coffee One Love, One Heart into our old-fashioned stovetop percolator and let the steam do its magic.

Yum. Great flavor, and strong enough. Even though I prefer my coffee whitened and sweetened, I was surprised that I enjoyed the Marley Coffee black. This coffee was great alone, and would probably do well as a mixer for cooking or alcohol recipes.

Next time, we may experimentally open the pods and try the in the Keurig; however, we *were* satisfied with the percolator.

Text: Salt is just salt? Not really. Few things this expensive are worth it. This is
Fast shipping. Easy to follow directions. Great experience for my son who loves science and had been wanting carnivorous plants.

I have been buying this dressing for several years and find it the best fat free dressing on the market.  I use it even when I am not watching my calories or fat intake.  Great flavor and only 10 cal per 2 tbsp serving.

Summary: A very sweet tea-mostly berry with a hint of vanilla
Text:
The Blackberry Vanilla Herbal Tea by Lipton is caffeine free tea with real pieces of blackberry in a neat little pyramid-shaped mesh bag. It is very fancy so drink with your pinky up!

Ok, so seriously it is a very different tea from what I am used to drinking. Inside the cool bag are little pieces of the following: hibiscus flowers, rosehips, sweet blackberry leaves, dried blackberry current, dried blueberry and dried raspberry pieces. The smell is is lovely. It steeps a very pretty purplish color.

At first I tried it hot and straight, sans sweetener, and found it kind of sour. It was also naturally sweet too if that makes any sense. The vanilla is not very strong but it is there. When I added a packet of Stevia it became very sweet, almost too sweet. Next I tried it as an iced tea. I enjoyed the sweet yet sour taste much better this way. It also looked very pretty in the clear glass with its beautiful color.

This is not a bad tea, but it is not really the kind of tea I go for. I prefer it cold to hot and I would be careful of how much sweetener you add to it. Maybe half a packet will do ya. I don't think I would buy it again, but I am not going to throw it in the trash either. I wanted to love it so I am sad I do not.
These just taste like hot sweet apple juice. There is no cider component to the flavor at all. Rather than having a tart apple flavor with cider spices, the flavor is too sweet and rather flat.
This coffee is pretty decent, just not what I anticipated. I was expecting a more pronounced cinnamon flavor. I think next time I will just add ground cinnamon to the coffee for the same result.

I like how there is a light fruit flavor to the water, along with no calories. The fruit flavor is not to stong, it just strong enough to give it a pleasant taste. It is not really that sweet eather.

My 5 1/2 year old daughter even enjoys drinking it and will actally ask for it. I like the fact that this has a variety of flavors, especially since my daughter has her favorite flavors and I have mine. So the variety pack works well in my family.

I was skeptical initially, but after having totally porked out regular peanuts over the last several days I knew I needed to do something quick! This stuff is amazing and totally satifies my peanut craving. As gross as it sounds, I actually enjoy eating it straight out of the jar :^)
My dog LOVES this food. He follows us around at meal time till he gets his food and then never leaves his dish till it's gone.

Summary: My dog loves it as a treat or sprinkled on her food.
Text: These are very good for a dog who is pickie about thier food. If you give them just before eating they seem to want to eat more of the food you use to feed them.Gimborn FReeze dried treats 11.5 oz. Chicken Liver is a good source of nutrion for pickie eaters of dog food.

Once you tasted these Snapea Crisps you will be wanting more.The way the company can do this to peas is amazing and the good part about these crisps is the fact that they are baked and have natural ingredients. If you can't get your children to eat vegies try this product. My family loves them and they are also great in salads.

All you need in addition to the Serendipity3 Powder is milk and ice cubes. With those 3 ingredients, you could be a STAR!!! The finished product is the most outstanding Frozen Hot Chocolate in the world. This is not an exaggeration. Makes for the perfect finishing touch for any kind of dinner.

40 years ago I became addicted to Serendipity3's Frozen Chocolate from the restaurant of the same name, and it's only since discovering that you can purchase the powder that I have found that I can duplicate this wonderful dessert. Hurray for Amazon for finding and marketing this fabulous product.

and enjoy!

If being able to carry along a snack, and needing protein is part of your decision, this flavor in a steak strip cannot be beat !  You won't go wrong on this item.

First of all, these are not bully sticks, or bully-anything, which I thought were made from the private parts of a bull. Not calling them cow ears, which is what they are, is perhaps a strategy so as not to inflame animal activists. I get that, but these are cow ears and my Collie mix loves these treats - hence, the 5-star review. I don't have to eat them - she does. My Puggle is apparently on my side as he can't get past the extremely strong smell. Yes - It's that bad and I don't know why other reviewers have not made a point about it. I'm an old country girl and I'm not so sensitive as to be picky about such things, but please be warned that these treats are not merely "smelly" - they stink to high heaven. We have lots of smelly, yet nourishing, dog treats in the house, but when we serve up these cow ears, the entire house smells like cow manure for about 10 minutes and our hands have to be washed immediately. Please make sure that you store these things in a somewhat airtight container and use tongs when serving.
Dark and full flavored, but distinctly Columbian.  This is a great morning coffee. Better cup of AM Joe than you will get at a coffee place.
I bought this for my 3 year old who is a very selective (aka picky) eater so he gets more fruit in his diet. He loves it along with me and my 5 year old. =)

I ordered these to keep in my dorm, and opened a box in order to try them. They are a bit on the dry side, but with a glass of cold milk they are delicious. They are rather small and there aren't many in a box, but they are filling and taste very good.

The mango makes it a little sticky, but the bar can be easily pushed out from the wrapping and eaten a bite at a time without getting your fingers sticky. I really love the taste of this bar.

This is the ONLY type of treats my kitty will eat. I've tried buying at least three other types, and she won't have it. This was the first treat she ever got, and its the only one she wants. I like that the top is easily to close and open, and that I can shake it to let her know she's been a good kitty and is going to be rewarded. It's a good training device. Plus they're good for her teeth!
this mustard is called brown but it is identical to what other company's label as black.  good quality delivered in small bags.
I rated this product 5 star. It is really the same when you buy it from any other dealer, so the best deal really wins. I mean to look for the least cost.

My first experience with Dr. McDougall's products and I like the Vegan Black Bean and Lime Soup.  I reduced the microwave cooking time but let the soup rest covered for the amount of time as instructed.  It has a good flavor and is very thick and filling.  Some of his soups are for about 2 servings and others are for a single serving.  I purchased 6-packs for a couple flavors and they were packaged so well and arrived in record time.  I would recommend the Black Bean with Lime and will probably order it again.

Everyone loves Oreos. They're even better dipped in chocolate. I made a plate of them for my son's Cub Scout cookie auction and a plate of my cookies sold for $20. So yummy.

RECIPE

2 cups semi-sweet chocolate chips
2 tablespoons shortening
1 package Oreos
*optional: 1 cup white chocolate chips and 1 tablespoon shortening

**Before you begin, make sure everything is absolutely dry. Even a drop of water will ruin your creation.**

Melt the chocolate chips with the shortening in the microwave for 1 minute. Stir until melted. If needed, heat another 10 seconds at a time until melted. Be careful not to burn the chocolate.

Place one cookie in the chocolate and coat. Use a fork to scoop it out, tapping against the bowl and scraping the bottom of the fork on the bowl to remove excess chocolate. Place on wax paper and let it set. Store refrigerated.

Optional: To make it pretty, melt a cup of white chocolate with a tablespoon of shortening at 70% in the microwave for 1 minute. Dip a fork in the white chocolate and let it drizzle from the fork onto the semi-sweet chocolate covered cookies. If done neatly, your cookies will look beautiful.

Hint: I do one batch in semi-sweet chocolate and one batch in white chocolate. Then, I drizzle the cookies with the alternate chocolate. Plate them together for an eye catching presentation.

mis ordered because of the same/simlilar name as item wanted in ability to retorn because item classes as grocery oh yes you can put it up for sale discusting gav it to neighbors dogs Merry ChristmAS wit myself eating up the cost

I used to LOVE the ZICO Coconut Water.
I used to buy 2 boxes monthly.
Until they decided to change from the Tetra-Pack to the Platic Bottles.

For some reason, ZICO thinks its a better product, unfortunatly, the plastic leaches to the Coconut Water and changes the taste. It literally taste like plastic.

I stopped buying ZICO and went over to O.N.E., not as tasty as the Tetra-Pack ZICO, but atleast doesnt taste like plastic!!!

KEEP AWAY FROM ZICO, until they change it back to Tetra-Pack!

Aparently i found out after some dabling online. Its not 100% coconut water, they changed the process where they make the coconut water out of CONCENTRATE.....honestly...concentrate??? No i am pissed off.....

I used to not like Coconut water.  When I was in Thailand in 2005 I had a fresh one sliced open and could barely put it down.  Years later, by forcing myself to love it, I now am addicted.  You can learn to love this stuff.  And with its many muscle revitalizing and cholesterol healing properties, you can too.  Coconut water reportedly has a unique long-form cholesterol that helps regulate bad cholesterol, among other healing properties.  Not a low calorie food, are you kidding?  This is nothing compared to juice, tea, soda, etc..  The only natural drinks that have it beat on calories are black coffee and tea. This product is not from concentrate and tastes delicious.  If I could afford it, I would only need this one drink for life and I'd be happy.

First of all the shipping charges are ridiculous. $10+ to ship something that is 1.5 lbs? Give me a break. Second they shipped me the wrong thing, they gave me the flourescent colors, and there is 2 of each color. I mean why would I want small bottles of 2 of each color? It would be more cost effective just to buy a big bottle of each. I am trying the americolors because they seem to get such rave reviews, and I wanted a small sample pack before I went out and blew a ton of money on them.

I will be sending them back, and asking them to send me the correct ones that I ordered. I will check back and let you know how it goes...

My lab loves these!! I purchased my first bag from the vet at a much higher price.  What a great surprise to find the same exact product at 1/2 the price!! They really keep my dogs teeth clean, he thinks he is getting a super great treat, and it is much easier than brushing his teeth.  You really should try this product.
This coffee is at least as good as any of the actual Keurig K-cups at a much lower cost. I will definitely order it again!

Sometimes I feel like I've been on a diet forever. Of course, I haven't been -- I've been on and off one or another, then back again.

I don't believe any tea is a wonder cure for everything, but I find tea helpful in managing my appetite, my stress levels, and outlook on life. I drink this Oolong tea, really enjoy it, and suspect it helps me feel less hungry in the midafternoon.

I've heard it's rich in anti-oxidants, and promotes the burning of fat. It may well be. I've lost bodyfat and weight -- but, again, I believe the result are due to a combination of factors that includes regular exercise, counting calories, and taking time to for a deep breath and a warm cuppa.

This is my favorite flavor, and I decided to purchase from Amazon rather than grocery store because it's better priced.  Everyones taste buds are different, so I recommend trying one first before buying multiple quanitites.  The others are good too, but I find this to be my ultimate favorite.  Love the fact that it's zippo calories.
Ordered this plant as a gift (3) from Hirt's gardens.  Two are not going to make it.  Will not order from Hirt's again.  :(

I usually take Royal Jelly which you consistently take you fell your energy stays at an all time high.  with this product also including bee pollen I get more bang for the buck than purchasing royal jelly alone

"Amy's Organic Thai Coconut Soup" is great when I don't have time to make my own Tam Kha. I am not able to try "Thai Kitchen Coconut Ginger Soup" because I am allergic to the Anchovy it contains. The Thai Kitchen also contains almost twice the amount of sodium than Amy's product.

It is a quick base for a meal with additions or leftovers like: shellfish, chicken, rice, rice noodles, vegetables, and additional spices if you like it spicier.

The flavors are well balanced and can be zipped up or toned down depending on individual tastes.

This was a gift for my daughter.  I've always enjoyed cooking with Provence herbs and thought she would, too.  It's a nice combination of herbs which can be used on all sorts of food.  Prompt delivery and excellent seller.

I love stevia, I have experimented with the liquid, glycerin, the one oz powder size and this is by far the best for your money.  Just be careful adding it to something cold, you might want to mix it with warm-to-hot water first to get it in liquid form before adding it.  Also, I make approx 2 liters of tea at a time and only need to add one-half teaspoon stevia powder!  I am very thankful for this 16 oz size!

I have been using Aromat Seasoning for around 12 years after receiving it as a gift from a friend from Switzerland.  Since I had to ask him to supply me when we ran low, I used it very sparingly.  I searched it on the internet this morning and was thrilled to find it on Amazon.  The price is also great.  Now that I know I can order this from Amazon I am anxious to experiment with some of the ways the other reviewers have suggested.  Thank you Amazon!

I was looking for organically grown, whole bean coffee for my percolator.  I'm very happy with this purchase.  The coffee is dark and rich, and is very affordable.  I will definitely buy this brand again.

When I first tried these tasty almonds, I was amazed at the great marriage of flavor. Has the kick of wasabi, and the sweet taste of roasted almonds. The first one is an eye opener each time even after you have had them many times. Bold and fun! If you like sushi, and you enjoy the taste of wasabi, these are for you.

I love the RiceSelect blends.  I have tried four of them including this Royal Blend and find each of them unique, adaptable and delicious.  I make them in my rice machine and they come out perfect every time.  I use them as side dishes and in casseroles and find they add zing to every meal.  I brought a casserole with this blend to a potluck supper and every single grain and berry was gone at the end.  It was a big hit.  If you want to try something different from regular brown or white rice, give RiceSelect Royal Blend a whirl.  I'm betting you enjoy every morsel.
This cliff bar is much more expensive than the nature valley products. But, it is not worth to be pricey.

Summary: Great Aroma but flavor Just Okay
Text: I tried this based on the great customer reviews.  I use the Keurig at work (we have one that everyone shares - you just need to bring in your own K-Cups).  The aroma is fantastic, but the actual flavor is just okay. We typically run it through twice using the small cup setting, so it gives us a full large cup.  Maybe this is better if you just run it through one time and make a short cup.  I thought maybe it was just me, so I gave it to a friend who also loves flavored coffee.  He tried it and was not very excited either.  It is certainly a personal preference with regard to flavor.

These Greenies are a great buy. I used to get the Petite size for my Bicon/Poodle and my Bichon, but found that you get more treats with the Teenies and the dogs enjoy them just as much. So, if you have small dogs up to say 25 or 30 pounds, the Teenies are the best. I don't think you can find them any cheaper.
My dog seems to know when it about noon and time to "brush his teeth!" He does vertical jumps until that little green toothbrush comes out of the container!

Summary: Bought via Groupon...not as fresh as I hoped.
Text: I bought these macarons through Groupon and only spent $24. When they arrived, the cool pack was warm to the touch. The macarons were wrapped in plastic in sets of 12. I was excited to have that fresh macaron taste, but I was sorely disappointed. They lacked the typical moisture and the flavors were a bit bland. Even though I put them in the fridge, they are getting harder and less tasteful by the minute. I guess nothing beats fresh macarons from Paris!

Ever since I started using primarily organic products with natural sugars, I've relied on St. Dalfour's products to satisfy my sweet cravings. Their preserves are amazing. They haven't been over-processed like many common market jams/jellies. When you get the blueberry one, you see blueberries. So, yes, the texture may be a bit different, but the quality and taste are unsurpassed.

Avoderm oven baked lamb and brown rice has proven to be the best food for Trevor (greyhound).  It's easy for him to digest, has improved his coat (thicker and glossy) and lessened intestinal gas.  He eats it with apparent enjoyment.  It's not easy to find this product everywhere.  Amazon has had it and at the best price.

When I first saw a commercial for this product I was a bit skeptical whether or not it would live up to expectations. Personally I found that the product lived up to, and maybe surpassed some of my expectations. If you are like me, constantly looking for ways to spice up your drink without the extra sugar and calories, this is a great product for you. Mio allows you to add as much extra flavor as you want, you can add a drop, or pour the entire bottle into your drink, the result is a sugar free drink that is specifically designed by you.

I personally really enjoyed this product because it has no calories, and no sugar in it. Drinking 8 glasses of water a day is a struggle, but this is one way to get your water intake and enjoy a flavored drink without any extra calories. If you are looking to cut back on your sugary drink intake, this is a great product to pick up, because it will allow you to enjoy a flavored drink without the sugar.

This is good quality mango.  I have tried many different kinds of dried mango and this is not the best, but it is the best for the price.  It is not stringy, has good flavor and a lot of sweetener.  I would give it 5 stars if it didn't have artificial coloring.

This is a staple for us. Whole Foods carries it only intermittently, so finding it here on Amazon in a pack of six was great. It is not necessarily cheaper than it would be in the store, but at least they have it. The other grocery stores near us do not have it.

We cook this by microwaving it. Even with only a two serving portion in the bowl, you will need a wide (3 inches at the base) and tall (five inches or taller) bowl to be able to microwave it without the oatmeal bubbling out over the bowl. That's my only complaint about this otherwise tasty, highly affordable, super-healthy food. I have to cook it in a huge bowl to keep the microwave clean.

I add shaved almonds and raisins to this. Brown sugar is also very, very delicious with it.

I live at 7,000 feet, by the way. If you are closer to sea level, maybe you won't have the bubbling over problem.

I love Stash mint green & white teas but this is not my favorite variation. It's much better over ice than warm so I think I'll use my purchase to make lots of iced tea. To be fair, it's a high quality tea. I think I really wanted a real mojito.
I misunderstood this add. The price is a major rip off do not buy at any cost.

Quality, taste,versatility & price makes this a great food product to use your imagination with. It's flavorful without being overbearing, the ingredients are fresh-tasting & the very useful size & container make it a 'must-have' in your fridge. I've used it as suggested but also made rice with it (try a little orange juice for liquid), I've marinated pork loin, put it on a beef roast w/ extra tamarind paste, made soup with spinach, noodles & left-over chicken...Versatility is it's middle name. Use your imagination & enjoy this delcious sauce.  Purchased during a 'Grocery sale' & joining Prime for shipping gives this added bonus.

I've heard the Mercken's brand of melts works great for things like cake pops. My order did not come close to meeting these expectations. I think the package I received was old because after just 30 seconds in the microwave, the melts were crumbling and never melted. These are also very expensive for the amount you get. I would beware ordering these from Amazon - maybe the ones you buy in stores are ok, but I don't have a store nearby they are sold in.

Summary: Not the same but still strangely addicting
Text: I have loved these from the beginning when they were delfa rolls and then danish ribbons. I was devastated when they were nolonger available and could not wait to try the "new formula" because they are not the same and they have a more artificial manufactured strawberry flavor. I searched for their return online since I am a fan along with my sister and husband and we adopted the new taste and it grows on you and becomes oddly addicting with the same texture that you love to unroll.

Tastes like lemon chiffon in one's mouth, but texture crumbles and is a bit crunchy (I like).  Messy food, but the wrapper, if one is careful, contains it well.  Filling too.  It's the single best non-dairy snack I've ever eaten.

At first I found it suspect that this butter was unusually pale and did not have the deep yellow carotene content of other pasture-based (as opposed to grain-based) butters. But then I tasted it and all hesitations were put to rest. It is mild yet not bland, rich and creamy yet not cloying, and has a fullness that is both satisfying and addicting. I usually like to sprinkle a little Fleur de Sel or coarse sea salt over unsalted butter, but didn't even consider it with this; it would have interfered with its luscious, subtle taste. We made this package last as long as we could and were sorry to see it go.

Summary: So much cheaper than in stores!!!
Text: This is Annie's best flavor of mac&cheese and usually it is very expensive (they stopped selling it around me about 10 years back and have recently started selling it again but at a very high price)...I love it!

Is what it says... just try not to eat too many in one sitting ;)
Amazon wants 20 words? Coke and root beer are my favorite!

The product itself is alright, but I haven't tried other brands to compare it anything.  It seems like the flavor could be a little stronger so a person wouldn't have to put so much in.  It cost more to ship the product than I paid for it.  As it turns out, I would have been better off buying the product from the local grocery store.

This movie is a classic scare comedy! Perfect for Halloween!!! If you love Tim Burton, this is a must own (pre Winona Ryder shoplifting breakdown). It's cheesy, fun, and a movie I can watch over and over!!!
This has made me into a coffee lover!  Very  mild and easy on the stomach, but with a great flavor.  Love it!
Taste like cookies. 200 calories I eat one every day for breakfast. Vanilla is great too as is wild berry  my husband likes chocolate peanut butter.

This is a great spice, typical of the southern Basque area of France.  Slightly spicy/hot, it adds great depth of flavor to any dish where you would think a dried pepper such as paprika might be appropriate.  Used to be very hard to find in the US.
The directions say up to 8 drops for a serving.  I find that I need 16 drops to get a mild sweetness.  Other than that, it is OK.

I had been checking out all of the stores in my area. My town is very small. We have just one store. But, I shop in El Paso and Midland-Odessa usually once a month. I was dismayed to find all of the large supermarkets in that area do not carry the decaffeinated Suisse Mocha Coffee Drink Mix made by General Foods International. Then I said to my self. Where did you find the Campbell's Butternut Squash soup? Amazon.com. I got on the computer and sure enough there it was - my decaffeinated Suisse Mocha.

I am so thankful everyday that I usually can find "hard to find" items on Amazon. The delivery is fast, the product is packaged wonderfully and the product is delicious. Thank you again Amazon.com

Sincerely,

Carolyn Delaware

Summary: Tasty, crunchy and healthier than regular chips
Text: I have tried all of the flavors of Popchips and the Original is my favorite.  You know those chips Munchos that you get at convenience stores?  Well, these kind of remind me of them but they are: 1) tastier, 2) less salty, 3) less processed tasting and 4) better for you.  These are great snacking chips, good with dip, but definitely great on their own.  Crunchy and delicious!  If you like potato chips, you will definitely like Popchips.  Only thing that is weird is that some of the bags are saltier than others - I am not sure why.

Best Roasted flavored whole bean coffee, better than S********'s, comes dated, amazon always brings in the newest batch and does not sit on shelf very long, makes a good pot of java and doesnt last long, the whole family goes thru 3 pots a day. cant get enough.

ProfileName: Tracy A. Altman "Evidence Soup & Ugly Research"
Text: Finally! I can indulge in a crunchy, tasty snack that I won't regret an hour later. My favorite is the sea salt and vinegar flavor -- not too much vinegar, and just the right amount of salt. (The plain Pop Chips are solid, too.) These chips are unbelievably light. They give me the same satisfaction as munching on popcorn, but with less guilt and hassle.

This tea is an excellent alternative to over the counter products. My sister gave me some after I had been taking medication that caused problems with my regularity. There was no cramping, no waiting hours to see if it was going to work, and no after effects.

Summary: This is not premium quality tea
Text: I agree with the other reviewers.  Stash has some great teas, but this is not one of them.  I consider myself to be fairly well-educated when it comes to tea, and I have never seen tea milled in this manner before.  There are large bits and chunks of leaves and stems.  The flavor of the tea is very grassy, and the tea looks like it is relatively raw.  I guess you get what you pay for.  I'd avoid this tea and get the organic pinhead green.  Better yet, visit Stash's website for teas that come from established tea estates.  I recommend the Ambootia tea estate's Darjeeling Green.
We love this product and the size of the can is just right for the two of us forn a simple meal.

If you can get past the putrid appearance of the finished product, it's actually quite tasty.  Not quite a true tamale taste, but close enough to satisfy the craving for the real thing.  Ugly but Good!

28.99 dollars for one pack? Are people stupid, you can buy these at the neares supermarket for less than 28.99, aybe 7 or 8 dollars, but not 28 for one pack..  I know is easy to buy online, but buying this, is just playing lazy!
Love this stuff!  The order came quickly and was packaged well.  Nutiva's products are always fresh and healthy and come in so many different sizes to please all appetites : )
I liked the taste of these salsas but you might just as easily find them for the same price at your local store and not have to buy three at one time. Arrived intact with sturdy packaging.

As I am a decaf drinker, I was amazed that this regular coffee did not upset me. Drinking this wonderful coffee is like eating chocolate covered raspberry candy. It is not bitter as some coffees are, and it doesn't leave an aftertaste as some coffees do.

My guests also enjoy it.

All I can say is that I am very pleasantly pleased with this great tasting coffee. A great pick me up.

Let's be honest. Nothing will compare to real peanut butter - more specifically, Smuckers All Natural (creamy or crunchy, they both go down smooth). I'll crush a 26oz jar in a week, so obviously I needed a better alternative. Definitely still has a peanuty taste, but... something is missing. I'd still recommend this to anyone who is curious about it. I need to try some of the recipes they have on their website.

Summary: Unclear if any sugar or sweetener added
Text:
It is unclear if these are just 100% nectarines or not. They are not very touch or chewy, but instead they are pretty soft. I much prefer the really tough and chewy dried fruit that takes you time to gnaw on it and has no sweeteners whatsoever added to it. The nectarine flavor is quite low. If you want something that is soft, but not mushy, and not something that is really dried and chewy, then these are OK. If you are looking for really seriously chewy dried fruit (more like a jerky kind of chewiness), then these won't suit. I also ordered some of their other similar dried fruits. We'll see how they are compared to these.

p.s. Get enough stuff from this seller to cancel out the high shipping (which is high for one item, but does not keep increasing a lot with more items). It looks like shipping is insanely high, but only if you get a really small order. Their dried soy protein is really good and really cheap, for example.
We love ordering this stuff! Doesnt last long in my house though! Takes longer to recive than to eat it!

As a born and raised NY'er, chocolate egg creams ( which contain neither eggs, nor actual cream) are a beverage delight. A true egg cream can onnly be made properly with U-Bet Syrup and since I am now in the Pacific NW, i can find neither egg creams, nor U-Bet (actually I have found one true NY deli that serves them), so this was a find and a treat for me. My fellow transplants from NY are delighted as well....when they drop by, I can offer them the real deal egg-cream and tell them where to find U-Bet. Thanks!
This product arrived on time and I received 12 more K cups than I thought I would. plus free sugar! Thanks Keurig.

Summary: its maple sugar and its decent
Text: this may not be the absolute best brand of maple sugar out there however the price is low for the amount you get you get an amazing amount of it and it all tastes amazing ive ordered two boxes and im ordering two more currently however they do sometimes arrived a bit smashed other than that no complaints

Summary: good for skin, good for heart
Text: I absolutely love this deal. Got 4-pack and store it in my fridge. I use 2 table spoons every day - just adding to my shakes in the morning. It works wonders! My skin has improved and my heart rate is better.

Keep it in the refrigerator, because it's going to take a long time to get through this bottle.  The red and green are both incredibly hot, yet maintain a distinct full bodied flavor.  I tried it in a NYC restaurant, and put it in my fajita like you would say tabasco.....OUCH.  With a little more control you'll appreciate it more. It turns simple bean dishes into something special.

While attempting to locate Sunshine Raisin Biscuits, I found these on Amazon. They appear to be similar to what I was use to enjoying
with the Sunshine product. The similarity ends with the picture on the tin canister. The biscuits are over baked with burn marks on
both sides. They are frail and crumbly, not soft and chewy, with several biscuits broken into small pieces possibly due to the poor
manner of packing in their canister. What appeared to be the raisins was a dark rubbery substance that did not chew well, the biscuit
part was bland and after several bites I had a nasty burnt aftertaste in my mouth. Spending $15.00 plus shipping on a tin of biscuits
this size only to discover it is undigestible and non-refundable. This was a disappointment.

Summary: Easy, Good Start for the Day
Text: My local grocery store took this off the shelf to make room for something fiber-y with horrible artificial fruit/fruit-flavored bits. These are better-tasting, not too sweet, with a little crunch. I add golden raisins or fresh fruit. With this breakfast choice l feel full longer and am less likely to snack later in the day. The automatic shipments are convenient and economical, too.

Summary: My picky eater old kitty loves this stuff!
Text: I have a 17 yr old cat who needs special food for her old lady kidney-- she runs and eats all of this food whenever I put it out. It's pretty expensive, the cans really aren't that big, but if she's happy, I'm happy. There's definitely something about the morsels that makes this more appealing than the pate style food. My cat likes this much more than hi-tor.

I was so glad to find these on-line. My son fell in love with the candy at Halloween and I wanted Santa to bring him some too. The price was fair and the cady was delivered in great condition with a good expiration date. The only thing keeping them from 5 star is the length of time it took to get to me. I would reccommend this vendor to others.
Thanks

If your thinking, as I did, that these are made by Necco/Stark; Wrong!  They shipped me two boxes of 24 each World Candies Cigarettes which I could have bought for $3.25 per box elsewhere on Amazon.  What a rip off!
My dogs love this treat and I love the great price. Strips are thicker and more substantial than those on grocery store shelves.

Summary: Really good for a decaf ,will definitely buy again
Text:
I love my caffein but have really had to cut back ,so I was
pleasantly amazed at how good this decaf was ,I forgot I was drinking decaf .
Thanks for providing this great product on Amazon .I purchase all k cups here.

Whenever I open the bag my dog comes quickly with his tail wagging.  Definitely not a pleasant smell but it doesn't bother him at all.  Beef Tripe is good for dogs with kidney problems.  Price is about right, average for the treats included.  I'd give it 5 stars if it weren't for the smell.

First thing is I did not purchase crab legs from Omaha as the price is 10 steps beyond gouging. Here in the NY area they can be purchased for $7.99 a pound, no S&H. There are 2 sizes of legs, larger and smaller [usually referred to as A's & B's] with the larger being approximately $2.00 a pound more.

Considering that there's more shell weight than meat weight, $25 a pound is completely outrageous.

Look elsewhere for your crab legs. I hope Amazon takes note of this review.
A foamy tasty, cappuccino-like cup of coffee in about a minute, and no messy grounds to deal with after the fact.

My wife loves dark chocolate.  She formerly ate only Godiva, but when that company changed form vanilla to vanillin, she no longer liked it.  She LOVES this stuff.  She says that you can taste the fresh and she doesn't want anything else.

The tea bags were shipped loose and a little crumpled. This is completely acceptable for me, as I purchased these for personal use. However, this would not work if I was reselling these to customers.

Bottom line: the tea is delicious no matter if the packaging is a little messy.

Be forewarned!I did not know this product would be so salty. I usually get the lower sodium type of Better N' Peanut Butter (not that it is low in salt, at 85 mg.) and was used to that. This one tastes like salt and little else to me.

All three of my very picky eaters LOVED it! Being a vegetarian, I got tired of dealing with raw meat and mixing a bunch of stuff in it to make their meals balanced. With Ziwipeak, all the work has been done. Just scoop it out of the bag and into the dish and voila! A perfect and healthy meal. Happy dogs and happy me :-) I only wish it wasn't so expensive.

I ordered a case of this popcorn using the automatic re-order system.  After reading some of the reviews about the quality of the popcorn, I chose to give it a chance, price being one of my primary reasons for ordering and the automatic re-order feature.  Well, as they say, you get what you pay for.  Only about 2/3 of the kernels pop and of the ones that do, the popped corn is very small in size.  The product tastes really good, what you're able to get from the package.  By the time you figure the amount of unpopped kernels, you would be much better off spending a little more money for a premium product.

I learned that coconut oil of high quality is not only great for cooking but also for brushing on toasts and even for rubbing on skin with atopy. It soothes the skin after washing the face.  I love using the oil especially for stir fry of mostly vegetables as it gives slight sweet coconut flavor. This oil is a staple in my pantry now.

These gummi bears are full of flavor! There are also so many more flavors than other brands. They are perfectly chewy, the way a gummy should be, and they do not leave an after taste. I will definitely purchase these again.

We have tried several different types of Keurig cups in search of the right Hazelnut coffee. This is the best we've found!  Overall, I like the taste and aroma. The only possible opportunity is that it could be a bit stronger...but I think this is more a case of personal preference (I like my coffee strong!) The hazelnut flavor is well balanced---strong without overpowering, not overly sweet like some other hazelnut coffee flavors.

Summary: Krave maybe, but not much crunch
Text: This cereal seems to be aimed a market wanting Mini-Wheats while still getting some chocolate in there somewhere. The problem is that it wasn't overly chocolate at all, and the cereal seems to get soggy and fall apart almost immediately after milk touches it. Frosted Mini-Wheats at least give you some crunch for a few minutes. It's not horribly bad tasting, but I don't think this will become one of our regular rotation cereals.

I have used this brand of coconut oil in the past and I was never disappointed by it. It tastes good and smells heavenly. I also add it to My homemade skin and hair care products. I have tried other oils. Even Nutiva organic oil and I didn't like that oil at all. It lacked the deep coconut taste I like and also the rich coconut smell. I had to go back to Parachute and I will not buy anything else but Parachute from now on. To scared to try anything else out of fear I might get a product like that organic stuff I brought. If you truly have a love for coconut and know how to appreciate the true "taste" and "smell" of coconut then you will appreciate and "love" Parachute. Parachute is better than Nutiva hands down!!

Now I am going to use it for coconut popcorn also.

These rice cups are awesome. Peel off the top, pop in the microwave for 60 seconds and you have a steaming, perfectly cooked bowl of rice. The serving size is just right. One of the bowls is a serving for one person. Makes a great side for any meal.

I use this aioli to make fish smell less fishy, so my family will eat a variety of fish instead of just bland fish like tilapia. But this aioli would go well in a sandwich or as a thick salad dressing too. I want to learn to make my own aioli, but these jars are so much more convenient.

We had a dog for nearly 16 years, who had terrible teeth and foul breath, and ended up needing surgery to remove 19 teeth.  She had infections under the teeth into the bone beneath.  She ended up with kidney disease and we lost her several months ago.  We now have a 1 year old pit/lab mix, Daisy, who will not let us brush her teeth, and I am determined to keep her teeth healthy.  Daisy gets one regular greenie (she weighs 57#) after her evening meal.  Daisy goes bonkers when I open the package, dancing all around the kitchen.  She loves them so much. Daisy gulps down her food, but the texture of the greenies forces her to take her time when she eats them.  So far her breath is not even noticeable, and her teeth are pearly white.  Also, I never give her wet food, which sticks to her teeth.  And, she chews on nylabones throughout the day.  Buying this through amazon.com saves me at least $10, so I am happy to get this online.  The packages always arrive on time and in good shape.  When the weather was very hot and humid here, I did get one box where some of the greenies were stuck together, but the individual greenies were still in good shape.  I highly recommend this product.
This is one of the best and safe products made in the USA

Thank you, Dr Oz, for recommending the Lingonberry as a super antioxidant, as well as a diet aide! I completely get it -- when you eat the lingonberry, your taste buds are immediately blasted into nonexistence by these mini-Sour Bombs, thereby making every other food tasteless and less enjoyable! Voila... Diet!

To describe the flavor, I can only say that when I tossed about 10 of these little babies into my mouth and chewed, I was almost launched through the roof and my face instantly went numb.

My daughter, however, thought they were pretty delicious and ate them up. I was glad that she liked them; they are pretty expensive. I recommend these to anyone who really likes sour flavors.

Summary: So much easier on my babies tummy.
Text:
When we switch my daughter from nursing to eating her first solid foods we started with rice cereal. The misery that caused will be forever emblazoned on my memory. Colic, gas, and it backed her up right proper.

My wife and I started researching alternatives on the Internet. We found a bunch of references to how Barley was easier on a tummy. That Barley soup/broth is often what is given to people recovering in hospitals etc... I went to every local store looking for some. Family and friends that had used it used to buy it locally. I couldn't find it anywhere. I found it here on Amazon and bought this pack of 12 boxes.

We found rather strongly that this was much easier on my daughters tummy. She continued to eat without distress after we made the switch. We started using it just as cereal and then as she got older we started using it as a thickening agent and filler when mixed with pureed vegetables etc... She liked things better when they were less runny and we liked things better when she was happy.

We will be ordering more here shortly for the twins that have now joined our family. For us it worked great. I really do recommend it as a far better option that rice cereal.
Item arrived the next day in excellent condition; I was very pleased with the product and service.  These whirly pops have the best taste ever!

Green Mountain "Nantucket Blend" K-Cups make a very good cup of coffee in my Keurig B-40 B40 Elite Gourmet Single-Cup Home-Brewing System. This is a very smooth tasting brew that my wife prefers over the Coffee People, Donut Shop K-Cups for Keurig Brewers (Pack of 50) [Amazon Frustration-Free Packaging] I generally drink in the morning.

These are good on both "Small" and "Large" cup settings as well.

Highly Recommended!

CFH

I've finally found the best cereal in the world! Absolutely love it! Saw it at Costco about a year ago and bought a box to try it out; I bought it primarily because it had high fiber and high percentages of vitamins and minerals. The taste is fabulous...slightly sweet with a cinnamon finish. It also doesn't get soggy too quickly. Every day right after I arrive at work I plow through three or four bowls along with a handful of nuts and fresh berries. And man does this stuff make you regular! Within minutes after finishing my last bowl I almost always have a Code Blue situation necessitating a sprint down the hallway to the bathroom to lay some massive cable! Buy it man!!

Does it matter if things are healthy if they don't taste very good? This multi-grain chips may be packed with goodness, but they taste like a stale wheat thin that was left sitting in a bag of real tortilla chips for awhile and managed to pick up a bit of their flavor. I think I would actually like these better if they were simple multi-grain crackers without the thin brushing of flavoring.

Someone looking for a healthy alternative might be happy with these. If you are a compulsive snacker, then maybe you could get used to the taste. But anyone looking to chow down on some tortilla chips isn't going to be too happy, and would have to force themselves through a bag of these rather than eating what they really wanted.

Unless you covered them with cheese and made nachos. Because that makes everything taste better!
It's ok, my son eats it, he loves the carrots, he eats all of it. I'm going to move onto stage 3 foods.

What a yummy coffee, strong but not bitter, full flavor but not dense, and you can choose your roasting preference (I chose dark).  Cute packaging too, for those of us who care! It's shipped directly, and I got the package within 2 days.  Try it, you'll like it!
I continue to be a repeat buyer of this coffee. The full flavor, great taste and wonderful aroma makes it a great coffee experience.
Have used this salt for many many years and everyone just loves it.  Also put it in gift baskets for friends and family.  If you haven't yet............do try it.

Very good product! My boss found the drink in Marshall's and came to me and said: "You have to try this one " .We ordered two cases of cans and one of bottles. We got it shipped fast .Amazing and great product !
This was our regular purchase item from grocery store. Subscribe and Save saved me time and $ . Loved it
This is the best hard mint candy in the world.  Expensive, though.  I can't find it in stores.  Anyone know where I can get it off-line?

Summary: such a special gem, this one!
Text: after reading the other reviews, i'm confused and don't think that anyone was talking about THIS TEA! (sounded like most comments pertained to prince of peace green tea, and don't have anything to do with the instant dong quai and red date tea that i clicked on...that being said, this is a remarkable tea...it's delicious, it's instant (so you don't have to wait for it to steep) and it's really good for you...i just love the taste of this, but then again - i enjoy the uniquely-bitter flavor of dong quai (but this isn't bitter, it's yummy!)...for those who don't know, dong quai is considered to be "ginseng for women" beceause it's very high in vit B12 and helps to keep women from becoming anemic (due the their monthly cycle)...it also is said to help regulate irregular periods, when used on a daily basis...that said, this tea is special because it helps to "draw one's energy" downwards (and the red date, adds to this effect in that red is the color of the 1st chakra)...in other words, this tea has aphrodisiac qualities and will create pleasnt feelings when taken before bed (and it's "good for you" and it tastes good and it's a snap to make)...so what's there to be quibbling about?

I bought this for my boyfriend as his "funny" Christmas present. It is his favorite cereal. He absolutely LOVED it. He dared the kids to eat it. :) I ordered the product and was not sure that it would make it in time, because I almost waited too late to order and in 3 days it was here. I have ordered several things from Hometown Favorites and they are AWESOME!! :)

ALL MY CATS ENJOY THIS CAT FOOD BEST FELINE FRIEND CANNED CAT FOOD, TUNA TOO COOL RECIPE.  THEY FINISH ALL THEIR FOOD, IT IS A CAT FOOD SIMILAR TO FANCY FEAST CLASSIC VARIETY, BUT IT IS A NICE CHANGE FOR MY CATS, AND A NUTRITIOUS CHANGE FOR THEM.  THEY FINISH ALL THIS FOOD TO THE LAST BITE.  I PLAN TO BUY MORE AND TRY THE OTHER VARIETIES OF BEST FELINE FRIEND CANNED CAT FOOD.
I have had these before but found the best price on Amazon. I would have given 5 stars except for the fact that some cones are broken but most times I usually can use these anyway.

I actually thought I was buying the Van Houtte vanilla coffee k-cups that I usually purchase and I overlooked the description of "light." It certainly is. You can barely taste the vanilla. It's good coffee, but if you're looking for a real vanilla flavor, go with the Van Houtte k-cups that are in a darker yellow package.

I wanted to find a good training treat for my 5 month old puppy that didn't over do it but kept him interested enough to listen to me when training.  these are the best treats... they smell yummy and he never gets tired of them.  I highly recommend them and they are healthy!

I first discovered these as part of the fruit salad gummi mix.  When I saw these were available by themselves, I snapped them up.  They are absolutely delicious.  I've had them on my candy jar at work for four years, and people are still coming by to eat them.  The pink ones are definitely better than the white...which are way to sugary.  These are a bit more tart (but not too tart).
Although the daybreak is the best, this is a good second for when you want a good, flavorful, sipping cup of coffee...

I love good quality Vanilla!  I have not used this yet because I already have some on hand, but I have used the Rodelle Almond Extract and it is exceptional.  I've also use the Rodelle Dutch Cocoa, which is also quality.  I will definately order again.

Prior purchases of all spices from popular spice website, but I only needed pepper this time & did not want to pay the freight.  This was just as good, if not better & competatively priced.  Bag well sealed & peppercorns went into my 3 different grinders just fine.  Like the flavor, bold, but not overpowering.  Now on my favorites list for re-order time.

The spice and flavor go hand-in-hand, so I usually add all of the flavor packet. I make these slightly soupy, and I often discard a little of the broth to reduce sodium levels + spare my digestive tract from the ravages of my taste buds. Also great (and more of a meal) with egg stirred in near the end. I could eat these every day, but alas, that would have dire consequences.

Taking the nutritional drawbacks as a given, these are 5* for price/flavor.

Summary: THESE ARE NOT SUPER MINI BULBS!!!!!
Text:
I'm not sure why these are labeled as super mini bulbs. These bulbs are larger than standard incandescent bulbs and will not fit in many of my fixtures. I suspect amazon has mixed up the bulbs they are selling. I checked the manufactures website and this model bulb is not the item number that matches the super mini bulbs. EP2357AE bulbs are listed as 23-Watt Full Spectrum Bulbs. E2352AK is the product number for 23 Watt Super Mini Bulbs and they are not full spectrum bulbs. As of the date this review was typed the manufactures website is not showing a Super Mini 23 Watt Full Spectrum Bulb. I'm returning these. I also purchased the 15 Watt Super Minis and they are not the correct item either.
If you decide to purchase these bulbs you may want to check the manufactures website after you receive the bulbs to make sure you did in fact receive the right item.
I zap a bowlful of these in the microwave (covered with water) for a couple of minutes, then store the bowl in the fridge and warm up a half-dozen each morning with my breakfast.  Delicious...

This is a very flavorful and excellent salt! Also a great price. The item arrived on time and we are very pleased. We bought two of these, and gave one to our brother and sister-in-law as a gift. All of us had tasted this product in San Francisco at the farmer's market in the Ferry Building and were impressed. It's great to have this in our own kitchen to enjoy some more!

This is a good product, especially for those on a wheat-free, gluton-free diet. It is a little heavy, but tastes good, especially as toast.I tried Pamela's bread mix, but found it to be too sweet for my taste. I do think Pamela's baking mix is excellent, however. I use it for pancakes and any baking that calls for flour.

Summary: Not bad but not great either
Text:
I am a big fan of Ojon hair cream, and Josie Maran argan oil for my hair. These products are definitely not inexpensive, so I was excited to try the Clear Scalp & Hair Shea Nourishing Scalp & Hair Oil. I have to say that while this is not expensive, it also isn't as good as what I've been using. I have very thin hair and not much of it, so I try to use products that will not only take care of my hair and scalp, but also that will "plump" or at least give the appearance of thickness. Good job on my first requirement, not so good on my second. I have used the Clear Scalp & Hair Shampoo and like it, but because I found it a bit drying, I thought using the Clear Scalp & Hair Oil after the shampoo might be a good combination. I am happy with the way the this product nourishes my hair after shampooing, but it feels a lot "greasier" than anything else I've tried. I like the buttery coconut scent and my hair looked shiny after using this treatment, but it really felt like my sparse amount of hair was being "weighed down," which turned out to be the opposite of plumping it up. Using the Clear Scalp & Hair Oil on my hair when it is dry is a disaster. Even a small amount plastered my hair down to my scalp which was not in any way attractive. I want healthy hair, but I also want my hair to look as good as possible.
I would recommend the Clear Scalp & Hair Beauty Therapy Ultra Shea Oil as a "treatment" only, not as a leave-in product. I will use the product on a day on which I'm not leaving the house, and don't care how my hair looks. Then I can wash my hair the next day to lose the heaviness and greasy feel. Perhaps this product would work better on thick or curly hair, but if you have thinning or fine hair, this is probably not a product you want to use on a regular basis.

Looked all over the place for these locally and couldn't find them... so I splurged on these and am so glad.  My kids ask for them almost daily and I have no problem heating up the griddle and throwing a few on.  They cook up bubbly and soft and I've used them for tacos, quesadillas, enchiladas, and salads.  Very good and arrived less than 36 hours after I ordered!  I froze one package and have the other in the fridge.
Great price and a really good hot addition to a meal. I like to throw some in with a boneless chicken breast in the oven. Gives it a nice kick.

It's all organic and it's on PETA's (People for the Ethical Treatment of Animals) list of "CRUELTY-FREE" brands. Did you know that the leading brands of dog foods conduct horrible and cruel tests on laboratory dogs? Plus it is delivered to my door and no shipping charge (Super Saver Shipping), and costs less than the product I used to buy, saving me time and money. Oh yeah, and my dogs love it!

Newman's Own Organics Adult Dog Food Formula, 12.5-Pound Bag

Nature's Choice Natural Rawhide are the worst rawhide I have ever made the mistake of buying. They are loosely rolled with lots of little pieces that splinter when the dog gets to the center. They seem also to be more air than anything else. My Pup is able to completely finish one of these in around 20 minutes.  Really If youre looking for rawhide look elsewhere.
This was exactly what I needed. I mix two types of Royal Canin for my cat. He snubs all other cat foods. Great price!

Summary: Great coffee for the office and a great price
Text: This is excellent coffee and the employees find it easier to use than making fresh coffee.  I feel it is more cost effective because not everyone drinks coffee here so there is not a lot of waste.
I will not purchase this product again, each individual treat has a sticker wrapped around it....you peel the label and it leaves stick residue all over the rawhide bone.

I decided to try these pods because of repeated trouble finding Starbucks pods in stock at the retail outlets.  This product is less expensive than Starbucks and tastes even better.  Plus shipping is free so it was a no brainer to make the switch.  It arrived ahead of schedule too.

These cookies are great for kids snacks and for adults. But be careful, cus a little can get out of hand! I ate half of box while snacking and watching tv one night. Plus on auto ship, they are a great bargain.

Raw coco powders and nibs touted to be the hyest in anti-oxidant compounds of all plants have yet to be proven beneficial. Please keep in mind a few lab experiments showing that antioxidants slow or prevent stuff physically near them from combining with, you guessed it, oxygen, dont prove anything good happens in a human body from the same chemical activity. Vitamin E slows or prevents oil it is mixed with from going rancid. This is good, but do it happen in you?

U kno, not all "oxidation" can or should be prevented. Digestion is oxidation, and so is pickling, and cooking, and aging (wine, cheese, us, etc). Oxidation is necessary, so blanket awe for Auntie Oxidant is unfounded. You wonder if raw coco is worth the premium price--twice, thrice, or quad what regular (roasted) organic Fair Trade coco products cost. It is definitely worth it if you can rev up your proneness to enjoy the "placebo effect". I dont say that cynically. A benefit is a benefit.

THis product is milder than regular roasted coco nibs, but the mouthfeel is different than chocolit or roasted nibs--very fibrous. It isnt, however, celery, and breaks down in the mouth without much brux. My feeling at the moment is, go back to eating regular roasted coco products--nibs and powder, and take resveratrol or grape seed extract capsules to make up the diff in (presumedly) lost antioxis. Five stars, not for what the product is--but for what I hope it is.

A huge container, kind of hard to get it out once you get past the first few inches (you need a long spoon), but well worth every bit of effort. Adds a nice color and flavor to your popcorn. Just make sure that you're using a good popcorn maker. Not a microwave or stovetop one. Add this with the flavorcol seasoning and you'll have that taste that you're looking for. But watch out, it gets very addicting!
My 3 year old miniature schnauzer loves these bones. I'm really glad that they started making them wheat-free because he has food allergies.

I don't review things unless I love them or hate them. I love this one.

It's fairly flavorless, as you might expect from most pastas. It very quickly absorbs anything you cook it with. I prefer cooking it in vegetable or chicken broth! I love it, and (most importantly) my two-year-old daughter loves it. Great for a quick meal with some chicken and veggies.

To summarize: Cooks quickly, absorbs flavors easily, and it's easy for me or my little daughter to eat.

The blend is very strong and full flavored.  I was expecting more of a French roast flavored blend.  This coffee is the harshest I have tasted.  If you like a coffee that is super dark and will give you a kick this is the one for you.  I'll finish this batch and try the French roast next.

What can I say?  I have a sweet tooth!  I found this at Amazon.com and it is such a great price and tastes so good I have bought it about every other month.  So far I have orderd it 5 or 6 times. Goes great in a cookie jar for when the kids stop by.  Try some.
This doesn't taste anything like the old Tetra pack ZICO. It's now made from concentrate, which is not displayed prominently in Amazon description. DON'T BUY THIS NEW ZECO.

Mmm, this is my favorite Tazo tea. It's available all the time at my campus, but I haven't been able to find it anywhere but online. So, good thing I bought it in bulk!

It's not exactly orange-y as much as it is citrus-y. The licorice is also very noticeable. Combined with lemongrass, this makes for the perfect sick-time tea. The aromatics are good for the sinuses, the mint is good on the throat. I'm also told it's great with spiced rum, cognac, brandy, et cetera in the winter.

They look nice, but taste is bland and feel is rubbery. I simply satue'd them with onions in oil for 15 min on low heat until they became golden brown. The smaller pieces are tasty but big ones are very tough. I have not tried them in stong sauces, but no far it's dissapointing

Summary: Best pretzels at the best price!
Text: These pretezels are so good, you won't know they don't have wheat! They are crisp, buttery goodness. Also, the price on Amazon makes them affordable!
Gerber does not use BPA in their inner packaging, it is on the outside but it does not come in contact with the food.  Good product, yummy with a little butter and brown sugar heated up on the stove.

I heard about coconut oil from someone on pinterest and decided to do some research on it which led me to amazon. I bought two jars of this stuff, one to keep in my kitchen for cooking,etc.  and one for personal care. About once a week I put a couple tablespoons full in a bath and wow it has done wonders for my skin. My skin is softer, I have gotten rid of most of these little bumps I had on the back of my thighs and arms. I have used it as a hair conditioner, leaving it in my hair overnight and then showering the next morning. It leaves my hair shiny and healthy. I also use it as a spread on my waffle, just a tablespoon on a whole grain waffle with some jelly, it tastes great and it good for your metabolism and health all around. it is high in saturated fat so you have to be careful but I think the good of this product out weights that. all in all I recommend it.

Summary: Potentially messy but my dog loves it.
Text:
Length:: 1:01 Mins

Lickety Stik is a lickable (vs. edible) dog treat that comes in a variety of flavors, such as bacon, liver and chicken. The container looks something like an old-style stick of deordorant with a plastic ball under the cap that LOOKS like it would roll around, but is actually stationary. You squeeze the bottle until the gravy-like liquid treat starts to ooze out AROUND the ball and the dog licks it off. If you're not careful (i.e., if you squeeze too hard, esp. if you are treating a small dog like mine), you could end up with a mess on the floor. That said, it is not difficult to master how hard to squeeze to treat the dog...just be forewarned to squeeze gently until you find the right pressure to use.

As you will see in the accompanying video, my dog adores the flavor (I was using the liver flavor Lickety Split in the video). She whines for it sometimes several times a day (she knows where I keep it). However, she has a sensitive stomach and I have had to switch over to predominantly allergy-formula food and treats to reduce (and almost eliminate) the frequency of her spit-ups. The day after I gave her the first taste of Lickety Stik, she spit up for the first time in a few months. Perhaps that had nothing to do with it and it was something else, but it did make me wary of treating her with this product too often.

Note that the packaging says this product is "All-Natural with Vitamins," that there is only "1 calorie in every 10 licks" and that there are "over 500 licks per bottle." The product is made in the USA.

I can see where this product would be an excellent one to use for training purposes or on car trips, when you don't want to have to carry a lot of treats with you.

Edited 10/11/11 to add that, after reviewing a couple of other reviews, it appears that the rollerball is SUPPOSED to roll, which was my assumption, but it did not on either of the ones I have used (bacon and liver flavors). I just opened them up and tried to forcibly roll the ball. I was able to on one but not the other. Perhaps it varies by container or perhaps it takes a good while of use before the ball starts rolling. I've been using it about a week.

Summary: Personally could not taste the pistacio
Text: In the case of the batch I got, there was an excessive amount of both salt and peanut oil in the mix of pistacio paste.  So much in fact that it destroyed the taste of pistacio completely and I was left with a taste closer to salt and rancid peanuts, there are other brands without the added mixers, perhaps I got a bad batch of paste but there was no pistacio flavor in the paste I recieved at all; which has not been the case with other pastes i've tried- nor did this happen when i've made my own paste without salt and peanut oil as a mixer. Your experience may vary, but there are unsalted pastes available, that do not use peanut oil to excess as a mixer.
This is a an excellent product.  No trans fat and baked in an oven; no greasy fat that it is baked in.

Summary: You can see this is quality food when you open the can
Text:
I have 3 cats. 2 are inside and 1 is outside. They all loved this food, especially my outdoors cat. Unfortunately, my dog liked it even more, and it became a bit of a problem keeping him away while they were eating, and it normally is not a problem. He is a very picky dog who loves fish, so I could tell by his reaction that the seafood taste was definitely good.

As soon as I opened the can, I could see that this food includes real flake tuna - it is not very much different in appearance than Starkist tuna in the can for people. It does not have that terrible smell that some wet catfoods do, (Like the Meow Mix Wholesome Goodness). That is nice, because with some catfoods if you open the can and some flys on you, you have to go shower or smell like a fishmarket. This food is not stinky like that. It has a good enough smell to excite the cats, but the human noses here did not smell it in our trash or from across the room.

I watched my cats closely, and my dog as well, since he got 'into it' and it treated their digestive systems well. Sometimes new food will make them sick, but this food did not in the least.
I am only giving this a 4 star because my cats did not finish the red snapper flavor either time I put it down for them. They ate maybe 1/2 of it. I don't think they liked that particular flavor as well as the others. They ALL liked the yellowfin tuna the best.

Not enough coffee flavor and definitely to sweet.  It had good flavor, but I am just not used to the amount of sugar it had in it and I add a half cup of regular coffee to it to tone it down.  I wish I had realized that it contained sugar and cream, if I had I think I would have chosen something different and been a lot happier with the purchase.  Kids should love this coffee drink though....

I do a lot of baking and this yeast has never let me down. I store it in my freezer and keep about 1 cup in my fridge for frequent use. The quality does not seem to deteriorate over time, so long as you freeze it in an air-tight bag.

Whenever I run out of yeast, this is what I order. No complaints about Saf Instant Yeast, I'd never use any other brand.
My dogs go crazy for these treats.  Zuk'es Mini Naturals Dog Treats are the only treats I order for my dogs.  All natural and small enough to train your dog, if needed.  Just perfect!

I didn't want this person's strange review to affect this product's good reputation. This is the most convenient form of chocolate there is! Very tasty too. If you ever find yourself in the Army and are lucky enough to get M&Ms in your MRE they are quite valuable for trade; and if you can bring yourself to part with them you're guaranteed have the upper hand while bartering. I can never part with them though. They're the best chocolate fix there is, hands down, especially if you don't like licking chocolate off of the inside of wrappers.

Not much more to say-- I live in San Francisco and there are only two Coffee Bean locations in the city, both of which were often sold out of the French Vanilla coffee since it is so very tasty.  The coffee subscription option is perfect, and less expensive than buying in-store.  No complaints here!
So flavorful! I'm addicted. The best almost I've ever tasted. They're a bit on the salty side...so if you like salty food then this is for you.

We just bought this caviar, its a great price, and if you buy at least $25 worth, it ships for free, so I got two boxes. I have had all sort of caviar, and for the price this is great, I do wish the eggs were larger, but that costs more. At $4.69 per 3.5 ounce jar you cannot beat the price. Would buy this again!

Summary: I ordered 3 (sets of 9) and 3 were broken
Text:
They are beautiful and taste great but as per above- three of my order of 27 were broken. They are packaged with bubble wrap inidividually but still arrived broken.
I had to use them for party or woudl have returned them. thankfully, i ordered extras.
also- stick is rather flimsy... not a wooden stick as i had hoped... these bent a little

****
I enjoy bergamot a lot, but this tea was way too fragrant for me; still it was different and enjoyable to try. The bergamot flavor is strong, not subtle, and a bit overwhelming---it's all you can taste.

The ingredients of this tea are premium black teas with pure oil of bergamot---that's all.

The manufacturer writes: "Oil of bergamot comes from the rind of a citrus fruit which grows very well in the Calabria region of Italy. Pure top quality oil of bergamot is expensive but no blend or man-made flavoring can match the ethereal aroma and finely nuanced flavor of the real thing.
Certain Earl Grey fanatics have grown especially fond of the top grade Calabrian oil of bergamot that we use and have asked for more, ..More,... MORE! Thus was born Stash Double Bergamot Earl Grey. In our Double Bergamot Earl Grey tea, the black tea base still serves as a solid foundation for this blend, but the oil of bergamot takes wing and soars to new unprecedented heights. The flavor is quite pronounced but not at all soapy or bitter which would happen with low grade oils. Is the flavor too strong? For a conservative drinker, maybe yes, but more adventurous types really seem to like it."

I must not be adventurous enough. I do agree with the manufacturer, though, and it might be the tea for you if you're a huge fan of bergamot and want a lot of it, and I also agree that it tastes pure, not soapy or bitter at all.
****
Our 2 Vizslas have done very well with this food since we switched from Foster Smith food last year.

Overall I prefer a stronger coffee than Gloria Jean's Butter Toffee, but I tried this coffee when in an accountants office and really liked the flavor.  It is not a K-Cup that I drink every day, but it is definitely good for a change of pace.  If it were a little stronger I would rate it five stars.

The seeds I got were clearly non viable and I threw all but one in the garbage. Terrible customer service as well.  I emailed 4 times to 3 different email addresses they have posted and never got a response.
I love this product. I wanted to make a home version of Dunkin' Donuts coconut cream coffee and this syrup did the trick. The bottles are huge and will last a long time.

Summary: Really good on a grey day!
Text: Thoroughly enjoyed each and every cup of Cafe Escapes Chai Latte in my previous order . . . so I'm reordering to enjoy as the days get shorter and cooler. Don't have a Keurig Brewer, so I just empty the single cup pack in a mug, stir in boiling water, wait a minute, and then sit and enjoy! Cafe Escapes Chai Latte K-cups for Keurig Brewers, 16 K-cup Box

I am not a big tea drinker..But to better my health I decided to get use to drinking tea because it is much better than pop. So in the last year I have tryed many teas. I usually have to put splenda in it. But I had this as an iced tea at a coffee shop and added splenda and it was a bit sweet..so the next time I didn't add anything to it and it was awesome!!!! I love this stuff. I will drink it as long as I can get it. Unfourtunatly I have to order it but its well worth it!!!!

Summary: Dried out and hard - threw it away!  How old is your stock?
Text:
Clarification - my review was from gum purchased from "The Candy Company". I have no experience with other suplliers.

DON'T BUY!

Used to love this stuff when we were kids, were excited to find it still available! REALLY disappointed we we opened the first pack to find the liquid center totally dried out and the gum itself hard and old. Open all the packs - same thing. Threw the whole thing away in disgust, should have sent it back for a refund of my $10.
